location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'A Turkish steamer and barge en-route for Bagdad' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:100 x 137 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘31’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:This image shows a Turkish steamer and barge en route to Baghdad. The steamer is heavily loaded with people clearly visible on deck, although much of the image is out of focus.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'A Turkish steamer and barge en-route for Bagdad'
